Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Oak
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB via Clark, Chicago, and State; NB via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to, street blockage near State/Oak.

Southbound buses will operate via  Clark, Chicago, and State. 

Northbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to police activity.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
